text:
I'm getting the same issue!
I've already reached out HubSpot support but they didn't know how to help me as they're not trained for development stuffs.
Now I'm lost.

Is it possible to add keywords to a module's meta.json file so that it can be searched for based on other terms? So say you have a module called "Staff Carousel" but in the page editor it could also be searched for by "employee" and "slider". (I'm not finding a definitive list of all fields a meta.json file can have. The documentation on the site isn't complete.)
